Replying to @rogie 2018-03-06 18:11
@rogie @mirshko @Netlify @contentful If you run a local build to gen your site, & that build slurps in content from APIs or data sources, you can run that same build within Netlify for the same result. Throw in some webhooks to auto trigger your build when any of your sources update and things get dynamic fast.
